div.span: Creating an account gives you immediate benefits:

ul.li: Instant rentals and purchases are 1-click away
Access the latest new releases every Tuesday
Securely store movies and TV shows in your CinemaNow library!
Playback UltraViolet titles across any UltraViolet-enabled device
Make digital copies of discs you already own
Playback Disc to Digital content on any device
Keep a safe on-line locker of all your media

div.div:
If you don't want to activate just yet, feel free to explore our catalog of 15,000 movies
and hit TV shows. Remember, you'll still need to activate before watching any titles.
You can do this at any time by going to Settings > Activate Device.

div.p: Please visit the My Account section of CinemaNow.com to create or link an UltraViolet account or to learn more about the added benefits of UltraViolet!

page, please rate at least 10 movies or TV
shows you like with 4 or 5 stars.

The "Recommended For You" option will then
show you other titles you might like.

recommendations!

Episodes will be automatically added to your library when they become available.
Please wait a moment while we test the speed of your Internet connection.
Your Internet connection is too slow to instantly stream videos.
Your Internet connection is fast enough to instantly stream SD video, but too slow for HD.
Your Internet connection is fast enough to instantly stream SD and HD video.
The speed of your Internet connection will vary depending on the time of day and the current Internet activity in your local area.

For a good video experience, we recommend 4 Mbps.
For the best HD experience, we recommend at least 8 Mbps.

div.p: Multiple audio formats are available with this title.
Choose an audio format preference below.
You can change the audio format at any time in Settings.
AAC 2-channel stereo audio. AAC audio is supported by the majority of playback devices.
DTS-HD™ is an advanced surround sound technology that delivers a premium home theater experience.

Dolby® Digital Plus brings cinematic surround sound to on-demand streaming movies. Delivering full-impact, discrete multi-channel audio, this advanced technology dramatically improves the listening experience of online entertainment.
5.1 surround available on select titles. If audio is mute, set the audio format to Stereo and try again.

div.div: Warning: This video is intended for mature audiences only. It may contain violence, sexual content, drug abuse and/or strong language. You must be 17 or older to Rent or Buy. By purchasing this item you are certifying that you are at least 17 years of age.

Warning: This program is specifically designed to be viewed by adults and therefore may be unsuitable for children under 17. This program contains one or more of the following: graphic violence, explicit sexual activity or crude indecent language. You must be 17 or older to Rent or Buy. By purchasing this item you are certifying you are at least 17 years of age.

Warning: This video is intended for mature audiences only. It contains explicit, sexually-orientated content and is intended for adults only. By purchasing this video you are certifying that you are over the age of 18 and an adult, as defined by the laws of the location in which you are currently located.

div.p: Press the Browse Store button, and browse for new movies or TV shows.
Activate your device to access videos in your Library.
Press the Browse Store button, and browse for new movies or TV shows.
Press the Browse Store button, and browse for new movies or TV shows.
Activate your device to see your current Wish List.

li.span: Select the Store button in the dock on the left side.
On the Store page, choose a main browse category from the left wheel, e.g. "Movies".
Choose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "New Releases".
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
To purchase the title, select the Rent/Buy button.
To find similar titles, select the Similar button.
To learn more about the title, select the More Info button.
To rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
To browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.
Select the Store button in the dock on the left side.
On the Store page, choose a main browse category from the left wheel, e.g. "Movies".
Choose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "New Releases".
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
To purchase the title, select the Rent/Buy button.
To rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
To browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.

div.p: SEARCHING THE CINEMANOW STORE AND MY LIBRARY

li.span: Select the Search button from the dock on the left side.
Search for a title, actor, director, writer, or keyword by choosing an option in the search wheel.
Use the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to select each character of the search phrase. Use the Enter remote button to enter each character when selected.

If you are searching for an actor, director or writer, select their name when it appears in the list on the right side. A slide-out panel will appear with a grid of titles related to the selected name.
Search results will appear on the right side when your search phrase matches items in the CinemaNow store or My Library.
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page. If you already own the title, the library details page will be displayed.
Select the Search button from the dock on the left side.
Search for a title or keyword by choosing an option in the search wheel.
Use the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to select each character of the search phrase. Use the Enter remote button to enter each character when selected.
Search results will appear on the right side when your search phrase matches items in the CinemaNow store or My Library.
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page. If you already own the title, the library details page will be displayed.
Browse to a title details page and select the + Wish List button to add the title to your wish list.
Select the Wish List button from the dock on the left side to view items in your wish list.
Choose a category from the wheel.
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to rent or buy it, view details, or remove it from your wish list.

div.p: Welcome to CinemaNow, where you can rent or buy hit Hollywood movies and TV shows, and watch them instantly on your TV! Choose from thousands of new release movies or catch up on episodes of your favorite TV shows, all commercial-free.
CinemaNow is powered by Rovi, the cross-platform service that allows you buy once and watch anywhere. Learn more at www.cinemanow.rovistore.com/info.
To activate the CinemaNow service, select the Settings button on the left, and then select the Activate Device button.

li.span: Select the My Library button in the dock on the left side to access all titles in your library.
The My Library page will allow access to purchases made on this device, and on your other CinemaNow devices.
On the My Library page, choose a main browse category from the left wheel, e.g. "Movies".
Choose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "All".
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
To play the title, select the Play or Resume Play button.
To find similar titles, select the Similar button.
To learn more about the title, select the More Info button.
To rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
To browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.
Select the My Library button in the dock on the left side to access all titles in your library.
The My Library page will allow access to purchases made on this device, and on your other CinemaNow devices.
On the My Library page, choose a main browse category from the left wheel, e.g. "Movies".
Choose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "All".
Select a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
To play the title, select the Play or Resume Play button.
To rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
To browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.

Go to www.cinemanow.com/parent and configure parental controls for your CinemaNow account. You can create a PIN, and choose which kinds of rated content to restrict when parental controls are enabled on a device.
To enable parental controls on this device, select the Parental Controls button in the dock on the left side, and enable the Parental Controls checkbox.

To automatically enable parental controls each time the application is launched, select the Parental Controls button in the dock on the left side, and enable the Automatically Enable Parental Controls on Launch checkbox.

To require the PIN to be entered when making purchases, select the Settings button in the dock on the left side, choose Family from the left wheel, Require PIN for Purchases from the right wheel, and enable the checkbox.
Each of the parental control settings can also be changed remotely, via a web browser. Go to www.cinemanow.com/parent to change settings for this device.
Select an option from the dock on the left side to access the main sections of the CinemaNow application.
Select a wheel, and use the Up and Down remote buttons to choose an option in a wheel.
Use the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to browse through a title grid.
Select a scroll bar on the right side of a title grid, and use the Up and Down remote buttons to quickly page through the titles.
Select a title in a grid, and use the Enter remote button to view the details page for the selected title.

div.p: If you need help viewing a video or have other questions about CinemaNow, go to www.cinemanow.com/support where you can search our Knowledgebase or contact one of our agents.
RENTING OR BUYING MOVIES AND TV SHOWS

li.span: On a title details page, select the Rent/Buy button.
Using the Up and Down remote buttons, choose a purchase option from the wheel on the slide-out panel.
If you have a CinemaNow Gift Card or Coupon, select the Redeem Gift Card or Coupon button and enter your code. The value of your Gift Card or Coupon will be applied to your order.
Select the Place Order button.
When the purchase confirmation message appears, select the Play button to start playing your video.

UltraViolet is an all-new way to collect, access, and enjoy your movies and TV shows in the cloud - brought to you by a growing list of companies building UltraViolet into their online stores, video apps, and devices.
Instantly stream from the cloud to computers, TVs, tablets or smartphones. Watch wherever you go, however you choose.
To buy an UltraViolet title and play your UltraViolet titles from within your CinemaNow library, you first need to link your CinemaNow account with an UltraViolet account.
Go to www.cinemanow.com/account to link your CinemaNow account to an UltraViolet account.
Find out more about UltraViolet, go to www.uvvu.com

div.div:
Ready to activate your device? Creating an account gives you immediate benefits:
Instant rentals and purchases are 1-click away
Access the latest new releases every Tuesday
Securely store movies and TV shows in your CinemaNow library!
